goal.en: To establish the basic concepts of modern astronomy
goal.ch: 建立學生基本現代天文學知識

content.en: This course will be followed the General Astronomy I to continue introducing the topics on modern astronomy, including binary systems; Milky way; galaxies; cosmology; gravitational wave; solar system; Terrestrial planets; Jovian planets; solar system debris; exoplanets; life in universe and special topics in astronomy.
content.ch: 本課程將延續普通天文學I，繼續介紹現代天文學相關知識，包括:、雙星系統、銀河系、星系、宇宙論、重力波、太陽系，類木行星、類地行星、太陽系小天體、系外行星、外星生命與特別天文專題等。

textbook.en: Astronomy by Fraknoi, Morrison, Wolff. This book can be legally downloaded from web Astronomy Today, 9th edition, by Chaisson and McMillan
textbook.ch: Astronomy by Fraknoi, Morrison, Wolff 本書可以合法免費下載 Astronomy Today, 9th edition, by Chaisson and McMillan
